product_name: Moving Comfort NoChill Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Layer the Moving Comfort NoChill half-zip women's top over a light shirt for chilly morning runs, and enjoy the smooth fabric, light wind resistance and extra warmth. NoChill fabric keeps you dry and comfortable by transferring moisture away from skin so it can evaporate. Ruched side seams add subtle styling. Lock-down zipper lets you ventilate on the go; zipper garage helps prevent chin abrasion. Thumbholes secure sleeves over hands for warmth. Zippered handwarmer pockets. The semifitted Moving Comfort NoChill half-zip women's top is designed to move with you during activity. Closeout.
short_description: Layer the Moving Comfort NoChill half-zip women's top over a light shirt for chilly morning runs, and enjoy the smooth fabric, light wind resistance and extra warmth.
